hints.label: thm-gauge-covariant-path-integral
hints.title: Complete Gauge-Covariant Path Integral
hints.content:
1022: :label: thm-gauge-covariant-path-integral
1023: 
1024: The full effective field theory for the Adaptive Gas on the Fractal Set has partition function:
1025: 
1026: $$
1027: Z = \int \mathcal{D}[\Psi] \mathcal{D}[A] \exp\left(i(S_{\text{matter}} + S_{\text{coupling}} + S_{\text{YM}})\right)
1028: $$
1029: 
1030: where:
1031: 
1032: **1. Matter action**:
1033: 
1034: $$
1035: S_{\text{matter}} = \sum_{(i,j) \in \text{IG}} \int d\tau \, \bar{\Psi}_{ij} (i\gamma^\mu D_\mu - m_{\text{eff}}) \Psi_{ij}
1036: $$
1037: 
1038: with $D_\mu = \partial_\mu - ig A_\mu^{(a)} (T^a \otimes I_{\text{div}})$ (covariant derivative).
1039: 
1040: **2. Coupling action**:
1041: 
1042: $$
1043: S_{\text{coupling}} = g \sum_{a=1}^3 \sum_{(i,j)} \int d\tau \, J_\mu^{(a)}(i,j) \cdot A_\mu^{(a)}
1044: $$
1045: 
1046: where $J_\mu^{(a)}$ is the weak isospin current ({prf:ref}`thm-su2-noether-current`).
1047: 
1048: **3. Yang-Mills action**:
1049: 
1050: $$
1051: S_{\text{YM}} = \frac{1}{g^2} \sum_{\square} 2\left(1 - \frac{1}{2}\text{Tr}(U_{\square})\right)
1052: $$
1053: 
1054: **Integration measure**:
1055: - $\mathcal{D}[\Psi]$: Functional integral over all interaction states $\Psi_{ij} \in \mathbb{C}^2 \otimes \mathbb{C}^{N-1}$
1056: - $\mathcal{D}[A]$: Functional integral over all gauge field configurations $A_e^{(a)}$
1057: 
1058: **Gauge invariance**: The path integral is gauge-invariant:
1059: 
1060: $$
1061: Z' = Z
1062: $$

hints.label: unlabeled-remark-47
hints.title: Gauge Fixing and Faddeev-Popov Procedure
hints.content:
1068: :class: warning
1069: 
1070: The path integral $Z$ **overcounts** gauge-equivalent configurations. Standard remedy:
1071: 
1072: **1. Faddeev-Popov gauge fixing:**
1073: 
1074: Impose gauge condition (e.g., Lorenz gauge $\partial^\mu A_\mu = 0$) and introduce ghost fields $c^a, \bar{c}^a$ with action:
1075: 
1076: $$
1077: S_{\text{ghost}} = \sum_e \bar{c}_e^{(a)} \nabla_{\text{discrete}} \cdot D_e c_e^{(a)}
1078: $$
1079: 
1080: **2. Open question for Fractal Set:**
1081: 
1082: Does the **antisymmetric IG edge structure** ({prf:ref}`rmk-fermionic-exclusion` in {doc}`13_fractal_set/00_full_set.md`) play the role of ghosts?
1083: 
1084: **Hypothesis**: The fermionic exclusion on IG may provide a constraint equivalent to ghost field cancellation.
